Additional information for California residents
-----------------------------------------------

The California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”) provides California residents with certain rights. Pursuant to the CCPA, we are providing the following additional details regarding the categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about California residents that we collect, use, and disclose.

Categories of personal information collected: We have collected the following categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) from California residents within the last twelve (12) months:

* Identifiers, such as [IP Address](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#ip-address) and other similar [Pseudonymous Identifiers.](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pseudonymous-identifiers)
    
* Internet or other electronic network activity information, including browsing history and information regarding individuals’ interactions with websites or mobile apps or streaming media.
    
* Geolocation data, such as [Imprecise/Approximate Location Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#imprecise-approximate-location-information) derived from device [IP Addresses.](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#ip-address)
    
* [Inferences](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#inferences-inferred-data), which refers to inferences drawn from any of the information in these categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) to predict the individual’s characteristics.
    

Categories of sources of personal information: As described in the “[Information collection](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.2et92p0)” section above, we collect the above-listed categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) directly from individuals; through automated means (e.g. [Pixels, Tags and SDKs](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pixels-tags-and-sdks), [Cookies](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#cookie) or [Bid Requests](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#bid-request-bid-request-data)); and from third parties (e.g., our Clients).

Disclosures of personal information: As described in the “[Information sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.ckzev9puv755)” section above, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we have disclosed [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about California residents in all of the above-listed categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) to our affiliates and vendors. Additionally, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we have disclosed [Identifiers](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pseudonymous-identifiers) to our partners.

Sale of personal information: Quantcast does not “sell” (as defined in the CCPA) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) and has not “sold” [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) in the preceding twelve (12) months in relation to operating the Solutions.

Individual rights and requests: If you are a California resident, you have the right to request that we:

* Disclose to you the following information covering the 12 months preceding your request:
    
*   
    * the categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we have collected about you and the categories of sources from which we collected such information;
        
    * the specific pieces of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we have collected about you;
        
    * the business or commercial purpose for collecting [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about you;
        
    * the categories of third parties with whom we shared or to whom we disclosed such [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information); and
        
    * if we sold or disclosed your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) for a business purpose, two separate lists disclosing:
        
    *   
        * sales, identifying the [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) categories that each category of recipient received; and
            
        * disclosures for a business purpose, identifying the [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) categories that each category of recipient obtained.
            
* Delete the [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we have collected from you.
    

If you are interested in exercising one or more of the rights outlined above, please click the relevant link in the [“Your choices and legal rights”](#Your-choices-and-legal-rights) section above. You may also submit requests by contacting us via email at privacy \[at\] quantcast \[dot\] com. We will attempt to verify your identity and respond to your request consistent with the CCPA.

If you authorise a natural person or business entity to submit a request on your behalf (an “Authorised Agent”), the Authorised Agent may use the submission methods noted above. As part of our verification process, we will require proof concerning their status as an Authorised Agent, which may include proof of their registration with the California Secretary of State to conduct business in California and/or proof that they have power of attorney in accordance with California probate law. We may also require you to verify your identity directly with us or directly confirm with us that you provided the agent with permission to submit the request.

Information about annual data requests is available in the [CCPA Annual Report](https://www.quantcast.com/legal/annual-data-requests/)..

We will not discriminate against you if you decide to exercise your rights under the CCPA.

Global Privacy Control (“ GPC ”) is a preference that you can set in certain web browsers to inform the websites you visit that you do not want information about your online activity collected over time and across third-party websites or online services. We honor GPC for all data subjects in the United States. Please visit the [Quantcast Privacy Choices](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) page for more information about GPC.

Who we are and what we do
-------------------------

Quantcast (“we”, “our”, or “us”) is a global digital advertising technology group of companies. Quantcast offers products and services that help digital advertisers and publishers (collectively, “Clients”) understand and grow their audiences (the “Solutions”). Through Quantcast Advertise Solutions, advertiser Clients can plan, activate, and measure the performance of their advertising campaigns seamlessly in a single audience platform, which helps them to place their ads to maximise results. Through Quantcast Measure Solutions, digital publisher Clients leverage insights to better understand the makeup of their audiences, how audiences spend their time across their digital properties, and what audiences care about, all of which help these digital businesses better connect their content and [Audiences](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) with the right advertising.

To provide the Solutions, Quantcast collects and uses [Personal Information](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) for various purposes, such as measuring and understanding audiences, targeting and delivering ads, measuring ad performance, and similar related purposes. As described in the “[Information Collection](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms)” section below, we may join or match [Personal Information](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) about you, which may include your [Online Data](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) from your visits across different digital properties, like websites,mobile apps, or streaming media devices (such as connected TVs (“CTVs”)), that have implemented Quantcast [Pixels, Tags or SDKs](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) (which is sometimes called “tracking” in the industry) or [Offline Data](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) . This allows us, for example, to enrich our existing data sets and provide meaningful reports for our Clients regarding the effectiveness of their ads or content. We may also combine [Personal Information](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) that we collect in order to probabilistically link media consumption to a single user, which is sometimes called [Cross-Media Matching/Linking](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms). To the extent that we combine [Personal Information](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) that we collect from and about you in connection with our performance of the Solutions, we will use such combined information only as described in this Privacy Policy.

This Privacy Policy describes in more detail how we collect, use, disclose, and protect [Personal Information](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms), otherwise obtain and [Process](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) it in connection with the delivery of the Solutions, and the controls we provide you to manage such information and exercise your choices and legal rights. As noted in the “[Information use and legal basis](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms)” section below, we use the [Transparency and Consent Framework](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) (“[TCF](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf)”) standard to facilitate compliance with applicable laws in Europe, primarily in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”). Because the [TCF](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) is one means of explaining [Processing](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) activities, and because our [Processing](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) activities are consistent globally, the [TCF Purposes](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) are applicable to all [Personal Information](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) that we [Process](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) (regardless of the information’s country of origin).

In the United States, the Solutions are provided by Quantcast Corporation, located at 795 Folsom Street, San Francisco, CA 94107. [Personal Information](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) relating to individuals located within the United States provided to or gathered by us in connection with the delivery of the Solutions is controlled by Quantcast Corporation.

Outside of the United States, the Solutions are provided by Quantcast International Limited, located at Beaux Lane House, Lower Mercer Street, Dublin 2, Ireland. In so far as Quantcast acts as a “controller” (as defined under applicable law), Quantcast International Limited is the controller of your [Personal Information](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) if you reside in the European Economic Area (EEA), United Kingdom (UK), Switzerland, or any other jurisdiction outside of the United States.

Self-regulatory standards
-------------------------

Quantcast supports and participates in several digital advertising self-regulatory organisations, as further described below.

* We are members in good standing of the Network Advertising Initiative (NAI) and adhere to the [NAI 2020 Code of Conduct](https://thenai.org/accountability/code-enforcement/).
    
* We participate in the Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA) and adhere to the [DAA Self-Regulatory Principles](https://youradchoices.com/principles).
    
* We participate in the European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance (EDAA) and are certified under the [EDAA Principles](http://www.edaa.eu/european-principles/).
    
* We participate in, and comply with, the policies and technical specifications of the [TCF](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms), as a vendor. Quantcast’s IAB Europe-assigned identification number ia Vendor ID #11.
    

Please see the “[Your choices and legal rights](#Your-choices-and-legal-rights)” section of this Privacy Policy for more information about the opt-out tools offered by the NAI, DAA, and EDAA.

Do Not Track (“DNT”) is a preference that you can set in certain web browsers to inform the websites you visit that you do not want information about your online activity collected over time and across third-party websites or online services. We do not honor DNT or other similar signals at this time, due to the lack of a clear industry standard. Please visit the [Quantcast Privacy Choices](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) page for your opt-out options.

Global Privacy Control (“GPC”) is a preference that you can set in certain web browsers to inform the websites you visit that you do not want information about your online activity collected over time and across third-party websites or online services. We honor GPC for all data subjects in the United States. Please visit the [Quantcast Privacy Choices](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) page for more information about GPC.

The [TCF](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf) is designed to allow a digital business to present information and choices to users on its website relating to the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of their [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information).

We [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) for the purposes for which it was collected or provided to us. The table below describes the specific purposes for which we [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) the [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we collect or otherwise obtain about you. * the purposes for which Quantcast [Processes](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) ,which are tied to the defined purposes for [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process), special purposes, and features set forth in the [TCF Policies](https://iabeurope.eu/iab-europe-transparency-consent-framework-policies/) and official technical documentation disseminated by IAB Europe where applicable(see Appendix A of the [TCF Policies](https://iabeurope.eu/iab-europe-transparency-consent-framework-policies/) for examples and illustrations of the purposes, special purposes and features,

Information security
--------------------

However, please be aware that no method of transmitting information over the internet or storing information is completely secure.

International transfers
-----------------------

Quantcast operates a global service, and we engage vendors located around the world to help us deliver the Solutions. Accordingly, your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) may be transferred outside of the country or region in which you reside, including to the United States and other countries where either our data centers, vendors, affiliates, or Partners are located. Where we transfer your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) internationally, we do so in accordance with applicable law.

If you are based in the EEA, UK, or Switzerland, please note that we may need to transfer your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) to countries that have not been recognised by the [European Commision](https://ec.europa.eu/info/law/law-topic/data-protection/international-dimension-data-protection/adequacy-decisions_en) and/or the [UK government](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-approach-to-international-data-transfers/international-data-transfers-building-trust-delivering-growth-and-firing-up-innovation#uk-adequacy) as providing an adequate level of protection for [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information). We generally use EU Standard Contractual Clauses (to facilitate both controller-to-controller and controller-to-processor transfers) or other government-approved contracts that provide appropriate safeguards for [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) that is transferred to countries that have not been recognised as providing an adequate level of protection. You can contact us at privacy@quantcast.com to request a copy of our Standard Contractual Clauses.

In certain limited circumstances, we rely on other lawful mechanisms for international transfers of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) or rely on derogations, such as the contractual necessity derogation.

Your choices and legal rights
-----------------------------

Under applicable law, you may have certain rights in relation to your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information). Additional details about the rights that you may have and how to exercise such rights can be found below.

* Right of access: The right to request access to your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) and receive certain information, including the categories of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we collect and disclose. To exercise this right, see our [Data Subjcet Request Form](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/)request form [here](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/).
    
* Right of rectification/correction: The right to request that we rectify (or correct) inaccurate [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about you. In practice, if you seek to exercise your right of rectification/correction, due to the limited [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process), we satisfy this right by providing you with the option to request deletion of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information). To request the deletion of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information), see our [Data Subject Request Form](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/) request form [here](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/).
    
* Right of erasure/deletion: The right, in certain cases, to request that we delete your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information), provided there are valid grounds for doing so and subject to applicable law and exceptions. To exercise this right, see our [Data Subject Request Form](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/) request form [here](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/).
    
* Right to data portability: The right, in certain cases, to receive a copy of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format and transmit such information to another controller. To exercise this right, see our [Data Subject Request Form](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/) request form [here](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/).
    
* Right to object (marketing): The right to object to the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) for direct marketing purposes. In practice, we satisfy this right by providing you with the option to opt out of our [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) for advertising purposes. To exercise this right, see our [Privacy Choices (opt-out) Page](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) opt-out page [here](https://www.quantcast.com/opt-out/). Additionally, as noted in the “[Self Regulatory Standards](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.qhdflh3wo5ir)” section above, we are a member of the NAI and a DAA and EDAA participating company. Each of these self-regulatory bodies offers a tool that allows individuals to opt out of receiving targeted advertising from Quantcast and other participating companies. These links will take you to the [NAI opt-out](http://www.networkadvertising.org/managing/opt_out.asp) page and the [DAA opt-out](http://www.aboutads.info/choices/) page. If you are located in Europe, you may prefer to visit the [EDAA opt-out](http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/) page.
    
* Right to object (legitimate interests): The right to object to the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) where we [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) it on the basis of our legitimate interests, as described in the “[Information Use and Legal Bases](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.fx68ye2m5t7h)” section above. Unless we have compelling legitimate grounds or the information is needed for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims, we will cease [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) when you object. To exercise this right, see our [Privacy Choices (opt-out) Page](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) opt-out page [here](https://www.quantcast.com/opt-out/).
    
* Right to restrict [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process): The right, in certain cases, to temporarily restrict our [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information), provided there are valid grounds for doing so. In practice, if you seek to exercise your right to restrict the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information), we will treat it as an exercise of the right on an ongoing, rather than temporary, basis (i.e., the request will be treated as you exercising the right to object to the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information)). To exercise this right, see our [Privacy Choices (opt-out) Page](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) opt-out page [here](https://www.quantcast.com/opt-out/).
    
* Right to withdraw your consent: The right to withdraw the consent you have provided at any time, where we [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) on the basis of your consent. Please note that the lawfulness of any [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) undertaken prior to your withdrawal of consent shall not be affected by the withdrawal. To exercise this right, see our [Privacy Choices (opt-out) Page](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) opt-out page [here](https://www.quantcast.com/opt-out/).
    
* Right to lodge a complaint: The right to complain to the relevant authority regarding the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) by us or on our behalf. In the EU, the lead supervisory authority is the [Irish Data Protection Commissioner.](https://forms.dataprotection.ie/contact) See the section “ [Contact Us](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.4i7ojhp)” below.
    

Please note that the rights listed above may not be exercised in certain circumstances, such as when the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) is necessary to comply with a legal obligation to which we are subject or for the exercise or defense of legal claims. Additionally, in order to protect your privacy, we may require proof of your identity before we can act on your request but only where it is necessary and proportionate to request this information.

If you are based in the EEA, UK, or Switzerland and have issues or questions about the above-listed rights, you may contact our European Data Protection Officer via [dpo@quantcast.com](mailto:dpo@quantcast.com).

If you are based in the EEA, UK, or Switzerland, under applicable law, you also generally have the right not to be subject to a decision when it is based on automated [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) (i.e., an operation that is performed without any human intervention), if it produces a legal effect (i.e., impacts your legal rights) or significantly affects you in a similar way (e.g., significantly affects your financial circumstances or ability to access essential goods or services). Please note, however, that Quantcast does not make decisions based solely on automated [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) that produce a legal effect or similarly significantly affect individuals.

Additional information for EEA, UK, and Switzerland residents
-------------------------------------------------------------

If you are located in the EEA, UK, or Switzerland, please note that the Solutions are provided by our European entity, Quantcast International Limited. In [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) in the context of providing the Solutions to our Clients, Quantcast Internal Limited generally acts as a data controller. More specifically, Quantcast International Limited is a joint controller along with its Client when we jointly determine the purposes for which your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) will be [Processed](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process). For example, we are joint controllers with Advertisers and Publishers for [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) that is collected as Quantcast [Cookies](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#cookie), or using [Pixels, Tags and SDKs](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pixels-tags-and-sdks) deployed by our Clients on their digital properties, and for the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of other [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) introduced into the Solutions directly by the Client. This is because both Quantcast and the Client have influence over whether and how we collect and [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) the [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information). In limited situations, Quantcast is the sole data controller of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) when we are [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) it for our own independent purposes, for instance when we use a Quantcast [Pseudonymous Identifier](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pseudonymous-identifiers) or we derive aggregated analytics for modeling, developing our algorithms, or improving the Solutions.

Additional information for California residents
-----------------------------------------------

The California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”) provides California residents with certain rights. Pursuant to the CCPA, we are providing the following additional details regarding the categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about California residents that we collect, use, and disclose.

Categories of personal information collected: We have collected the following categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) from California residents within the last twelve (12) months:

* Identifiers, such as [IP Address](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#ip-address) and other similar [Pseudonymous Identifiers.](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pseudonymous-identifiers)
    
* Internet or other electronic network activity information, including browsing history and information regarding individuals’ interactions with websites or mobile apps or streaming media.
    
* Geolocation data, such as [Imprecise/Approximate Location Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#imprecise-approximate-location-information) derived from device [IP Addresses.](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#ip-address)
    
* [Inferences](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#inferences-inferred-data), which refers to inferences drawn from any of the information in these categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) to predict the individual’s characteristics.
    

Categories of sources of personal information: As described in the “[Information collection](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.2et92p0)” section above, we collect the above-listed categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) directly from individuals; through automated means (e.g. [Pixels, Tags and SDKs](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pixels-tags-and-sdks), [Cookies](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#cookie) or [Bid Requests](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#bid-request-bid-request-data)); and from third parties (e.g., our Clients).

Disclosures of personal information: As described in the “[Information sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.ckzev9puv755)” section above, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we have disclosed [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about California residents in all of the above-listed categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) to our affiliates and vendors. Additionally, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we have disclosed [Identifiers](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pseudonymous-identifiers) to our partners.

Sale of personal information: Quantcast does not “sell” (as defined in the CCPA) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) and has not “sold” [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) in the preceding twelve (12) months in relation to operating the Solutions.

Individual rights and requests: If you are a California resident, you have the right to request that we:

* Disclose to you the following information covering the 12 months preceding your request:
    
*   
    * the categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we have collected about you and the categories of sources from which we collected such information;

Who we are and what we do
-------------------------

Quantcast (“we”, “our”, or “us”) is a global digital advertising technology group of companies. Quantcast offers products and services that help digital advertisers and publishers (collectively, “Clients”) understand and grow their audiences (the “Solutions”). Through Quantcast Advertise Solutions, advertiser Clients can plan, activate, and measure the performance of their advertising campaigns seamlessly in a single audience platform, which helps them to place their ads to maximise results. Through Quantcast Measure Solutions, digital publisher Clients leverage insights to better understand the makeup of their audiences, how audiences spend their time across their digital properties, and what audiences care about, all of which help these digital businesses better connect their content and [Audiences](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#audience) with the right advertising.

To provide the Solutions, Quantcast collects and uses [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) for various purposes, such as measuring and understanding audiences, targeting and delivering ads, measuring ad performance, and similar related purposes. As described in the “[Information Collection](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.2et92p0)” section below, we may join or match [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about you, which may include your [Online Data](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#online-data) from your visits across different digital properties, like websites,mobile apps, or streaming media devices (such as connected TVs (“CTVs”)), that have implemented Quantcast [Pixels, Tags or SDKs](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pixels-tags-and-sdks) (which is sometimes called “tracking” in the industry) or [Offline Data](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#offline-data) . This allows us, for example, to enrich our existing data sets and provide meaningful reports for our Clients regarding the effectiveness of their ads or content. We may also combine [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) that we collect in order to probabilistically link media consumption to a single user, which is sometimes called [Cross-Media Matching/Linking](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#cross-media-matching-linking). To the extent that we combine [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) that we collect from and about you in connection with our performance of the Solutions, we will use such combined information only as described in this Privacy Policy.

This Privacy Policy describes in more detail how we collect, use, disclose, and protect [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information), otherwise obtain and [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) it in connection with the delivery of the Solutions, and the controls we provide you to manage such information and exercise your choices and legal rights. As noted in the “[Information use and legal basis](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.fx68ye2m5t7h)” section below, we use the [Transparency and Consent Framework](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#iab-transparency-consent-framework-tcf) (“[TCF](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf)”) standard to facilitate compliance with applicable laws in Europe, primarily in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”). Because the [TCF](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf) is one means of explaining [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) activities, and because our [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) activities are consistent globally, the [TCF Purposes](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf-purpose-tcf-special-purpose) are applicable to all [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) that we [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) (regardless of the information’s country of origin).

In the United States, the Solutions are provided by Quantcast Corporation, located at 795 Folsom Street, San Francisco, CA 94107. [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) relating to individuals located within the United States provided to or gathered by us in connection with the delivery of the Solutions is controlled by Quantcast Corporation.

Outside of the United States, the Solutions are provided by Quantcast International Limited, located at Beaux Lane House, Lower Mercer Street, Dublin 2, Ireland. In so far as Quantcast acts as a “controller” (as defined under applicable law), Quantcast International Limited is the controller of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) if you reside in the European Economic Area (EEA), United Kingdom (UK), Switzerland, or any other jurisdiction outside of the United States.

Self-regulatory standards
-------------------------

Quantcast supports and participates in several digital advertising self-regulatory organisations, as further described below.

* We are members in good standing of the Network Advertising Initiative (NAI) and adhere to the [NAI 2020 Code of Conduct](https://thenai.org/accountability/code-enforcement/).
    
* We participate in the Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA) and adhere to the [DAA Self-Regulatory Principles](https://youradchoices.com/principles).
    
* We participate in the European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance (EDAA) and are certified under the [EDAA Principles](http://www.edaa.eu/european-principles/).
    
* We participate in, and comply with, the policies and technical specifications of the [TCF](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf), as a vendor. Quantcast’s IAB Europe-assigned identification number ia Vendor ID #11.
    

Please see the “[Your choices and legal rights](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.z337ya)” section of this Privacy Policy for more information about the opt-out tools offered by the NAI, DAA, and EDAA.

Do Not Track (“DNT”) is a preference that you can set in certain web browsers to inform the websites you visit that you do not want information about your online activity collected over time and across third-party websites or online services. We do not honor DNT or other similar signals at this time, due to the lack of a clear industry standard. Please visit the [Quantcast Privacy Choices](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) page for your opt-out options.

Global Privacy Control (“GPC”) is a preference that you can set in certain web browsers to inform the websites you visit that you do not want information about your online activity collected over time and across third-party websites or online services. We honor GPC for all data subjects in the United States. Please visit the [Quantcast Privacy Choices](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) page for more information about GPC.

However, as allowed by applicable laws and rules, we may collect and [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) non-sensitive health-related information (outside of the EEA, UK, and Switzerland) in connection with the delivery of the Solutions. Information use and legal basis
-------------------------------

As described in the “[Who we are and what we do](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.30j0zll)” section, we generally use the [TCF](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf) as the mechanism for describing our [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) activities, and in Europe specifically for establishing our legal basis for [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) and managing users’ preferences for online personalised advertising and related activities. The [TCF](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf) is designed to allow a digital business to present information and choices to users on its website relating to the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of their [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information).

We [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) for the purposes for which it was collected or provided to us. The table below describes the specific purposes for which we [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) the [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we collect or otherwise obtain about you. This table includes:

* the purposes for which Quantcast [Processes](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) ,which are tied to the defined purposes for [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process), special purposes, and features set forth in the [TCF Policies](https://iabeurope.eu/iab-europe-transparency-consent-framework-policies/) and official technical documentation disseminated by IAB Europe where applicable(see Appendix A of the [TCF Policies](https://iabeurope.eu/iab-europe-transparency-consent-framework-policies/) for examples and illustrations of the purposes, special purposes and features,
    
* a description of each [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) activity using [TCF](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf)\-specific terminology (to the extent applicable), and
    
* the legal basis that we rely on to perform each of our [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) activities.
    

Please note that in Europe, where we indicate that “Legitimate Interests” in accordance with the GDPR is the legal basis for [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process), we carry out the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) in reliance on our legitimate interests or those of a third party (e.g., our Clients), provided that such interests are not outweighed by your interests or fundamental rights and freedoms.

Measuring advertising performance ([TCF Purpose](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf-purpose-tcf-special-purpose) 7)

Quantcast will measure the performance and effectiveness of ads that you see or interact with.

  

In particular, to measure whether and how ads were delivered to you and how you interacted with them, Quantcast will:

  

* Provide reporting to Clients about ads, including their effectiveness and performance
    

  

* Provide reporting to Clients about your interactions with ads using data observed during your interaction with the ad
    

  

* Provide reporting to Clients about the ads displayed on their properties
    

  

* Measure whether an ad is serving in a suitable editorial environment (brand-safe) context
    

  

* Determine the percentage of the ad that had the opportunity to be seen and the duration of that opportunity
    

  

* Combine this information with other information previously collected, including from across websites or mobile apps or streaming media
    

In the provision of the Solutions to some Clients, Quantcast may correlate information between entries within its own datasets that have the same [Pseudonymous Identifier](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pseudonymous-identifiers) or with information obtained from Ad Serving, Ad Verification, or [Data Management Platforms/Data Providers.](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#data-management-platforms-and-data-providers) We do this to provide aggregated reporting to Clients about the number of visitors to their digital properties.

Quantcast does not apply [Panel](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#panel) or similarly derived [Audience Insights](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#audience-insights) data to ad measurement data without a separate legal basis to apply market research to generate [Audience Insights.](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#audience-insights)

Where we rely on Legitimate Interests, we carry out the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) to help our advertiser Clients meet their objective of ascertaining, measuring, and improving the effectiveness of their ad campaigns.

* Associate [Offline Data](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#offline-data) with you for the purposes of market research to generate [Audience Insights](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#audience-insights) (if we have declared that we will match and combine [Offline Data](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#offline-data) sources)
    
* Combine this information with other information previously collected, including from visits to websites or mobile apps or streaming media
    

Consent or Legitimate Interests, depending on the choice of the Client that is using the [TCF](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#tcf).

Responding to legal requests

We preserve and share [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) in response to legal requests from law enforcement and other government officials, to comply with a subpoena or similar legal process, and when we believe in good faith that disclosure of such information is necessary to comply with a judicial proceeding or court order.

Legitimate Interests

Complying with relevant laws and regulations

We [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) to comply with our legal obligations under applicable law.

Examples of Irish and EU laws enforceable in Ireland that could give rise to an obligation requiring us to [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we hold about you are:

* Civil and commercial matters: where we are in receipt of a court order to disclose information for the purposes of court proceedings, such as under Regulation (EU) No 1215/2012 on jurisdiction and the recognition and enforcement of judgments in civil and commercial matters
    
* Criminal matters: to comply with requests from Irish law enforcement to provide information in relation to an investigation, such as under Section 10 of the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1997 as amended by 6(1)(a) of the Criminal Justice Act 2006 or to take steps to report information to law enforcement where required
    
* Consumer matters: to comply with our obligations under consumer law, such as the Competition and Consumer Protection Act 2014 (e.g., where the Irish Competition and Consumer Protection Commission requests information)
    
* Corporate and taxation matters: to comply with our obligations under company legislation and tax law, such as the Companies Act 2014 or where the Irish Revenue requests information
    
* Regulatory matters: to comply with our obligations under data protection laws, including to engage with regulators, such as the Data Protection Commission under the GDPR and the Data Protection Act 2018

Information security
--------------------

We employ appropriate organisational and technical security safeguards designed to keep [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) secure when it is transmitted to us and once we receive it. However, please be aware that no method of transmitting information over the internet or storing information is completely secure.

International transfers
-----------------------

Quantcast operates a global service, and we engage vendors located around the world to help us deliver the Solutions. Accordingly, your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) may be transferred outside of the country or region in which you reside, including to the United States and other countries where either our data centers, vendors, affiliates, or Partners are located. Where we transfer your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) internationally, we do so in accordance with applicable law.

If you are based in the EEA, UK, or Switzerland, please note that we may need to transfer your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) to countries that have not been recognised by the [European Commision](https://ec.europa.eu/info/law/law-topic/data-protection/international-dimension-data-protection/adequacy-decisions_en) and/or the [UK government](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-approach-to-international-data-transfers/international-data-transfers-building-trust-delivering-growth-and-firing-up-innovation#uk-adequacy) as providing an adequate level of protection for [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information). We generally use EU Standard Contractual Clauses (to facilitate both controller-to-controller and controller-to-processor transfers) or other government-approved contracts that provide appropriate safeguards for [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) that is transferred to countries that have not been recognised as providing an adequate level of protection. You can contact us at privacy@quantcast.com to request a copy of our Standard Contractual Clauses.

In certain limited circumstances, we rely on other lawful mechanisms for international transfers of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) or rely on derogations, such as the contractual necessity derogation.

Your choices and legal rights
-----------------------------

Under applicable law, you may have certain rights in relation to your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information). Additional details about the rights that you may have and how to exercise such rights can be found below.

* Right of access: The right to request access to your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) and receive certain information, including the categories of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we collect and disclose. To exercise this right, see our [Data Subjcet Request Form](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/)request form [here](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/).
    
* Right of rectification/correction: The right to request that we rectify (or correct) inaccurate [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about you. In practice, if you seek to exercise your right of rectification/correction, due to the limited [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process), we satisfy this right by providing you with the option to request deletion of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information). To request the deletion of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information), see our [Data Subject Request Form](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/) request form [here](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/).
    
* Right of erasure/deletion: The right, in certain cases, to request that we delete your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information), provided there are valid grounds for doing so and subject to applicable law and exceptions. To exercise this right, see our [Data Subject Request Form](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/) request form [here](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/).
    
* Right to data portability: The right, in certain cases, to receive a copy of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format and transmit such information to another controller. To exercise this right, see our [Data Subject Request Form](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/) request form [here](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/data-subject-rights/).
    
* Right to object (marketing): The right to object to the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) for direct marketing purposes. In practice, we satisfy this right by providing you with the option to opt out of our [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) for advertising purposes. To exercise this right, see our [Privacy Choices (opt-out) Page](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) opt-out page [here](https://www.quantcast.com/opt-out/). Additionally, as noted in the “[Self Regulatory Standards](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.qhdflh3wo5ir)” section above, we are a member of the NAI and a DAA and EDAA participating company. Each of these self-regulatory bodies offers a tool that allows individuals to opt out of receiving targeted advertising from Quantcast and other participating companies. These links will take you to the [NAI opt-out](http://www.networkadvertising.org/managing/opt_out.asp) page and the [DAA opt-out](http://www.aboutads.info/choices/) page. If you are located in Europe, you may prefer to visit the [EDAA opt-out](http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/) page.
    
* Right to object (legitimate interests): The right to object to the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) where we [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) it on the basis of our legitimate interests, as described in the “[Information Use and Legal Bases](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.fx68ye2m5t7h)” section above. Unless we have compelling legitimate grounds or the information is needed for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims, we will cease [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) when you object. To exercise this right, see our [Privacy Choices (opt-out) Page](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) opt-out page [here](https://www.quantcast.com/opt-out/).
    
* Right to restrict [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process): The right, in certain cases, to temporarily restrict our [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information), provided there are valid grounds for doing so. In practice, if you seek to exercise your right to restrict the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information), we will treat it as an exercise of the right on an ongoing, rather than temporary, basis (i.e., the request will be treated as you exercising the right to object to the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information)). To exercise this right, see our [Privacy Choices (opt-out) Page](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) opt-out page [here](https://www.quantcast.com/opt-out/).
    
* Right to withdraw your consent: The right to withdraw the consent you have provided at any time, where we [Process](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) on the basis of your consent. Please note that the lawfulness of any [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) undertaken prior to your withdrawal of consent shall not be affected by the withdrawal. To exercise this right, see our [Privacy Choices (opt-out) Page](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy-choices/) opt-out page [here](https://www.quantcast.com/opt-out/).
    
* Right to lodge a complaint: The right to complain to the relevant authority regarding the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) by us or on our behalf. In the EU, the lead supervisory authority is the [Irish Data Protection Commissioner.](https://forms.dataprotection.ie/contact) See the section “ [Contact Us](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.4i7ojhp)” below.
    

Please note that the rights listed above may not be exercised in certain circumstances, such as when the [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) of your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) is necessary to comply with a legal obligation to which we are subject or for the exercise or defense of legal claims. Additionally, in order to protect your privacy, we may require proof of your identity before we can act on your request but only where it is necessary and proportionate to request this information.

If you are based in the EEA, UK, or Switzerland and have issues or questions about the above-listed rights, you may contact our European Data Protection Officer via [dpo@quantcast.com](mailto:dpo@quantcast.com).

If you are based in the EEA, UK, or Switzerland, under applicable law, you also generally have the right not to be subject to a decision when it is based on automated [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) (i.e., an operation that is performed without any human intervention), if it produces a legal effect (i.e., impacts your legal rights) or significantly affects you in a similar way (e.g., significantly affects your financial circumstances or ability to access essential goods or services). Please note, however, that Quantcast does not make decisions based solely on automated [Processing](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#process) that produce a legal effect or similarly significantly affect individuals.

Additional information for California residents

The California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”) provides California residents with certain rights. Pursuant to the CCPA, we are providing the following additional details regarding the categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about California residents that we collect, use, and disclose.

Categories of personal information collected: We have collected the following categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) from California residents within the last twelve (12) months:

* Identifiers, such as [IP Address](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#ip-address) and other similar [Pseudonymous Identifiers.](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pseudonymous-identifiers)
    
* Internet or other electronic network activity information, including browsing history and information regarding individuals’ interactions with websites or mobile apps or streaming media.
    
* Geolocation data, such as [Imprecise/Approximate Location Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#imprecise-approximate-location-information) derived from device [IP Addresses.](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#ip-address)
    
* [Inferences](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#inferences-inferred-data), which refers to inferences drawn from any of the information in these categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) to predict the individual’s characteristics.
    

Categories of sources of personal information: As described in the “[Information collection](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.2et92p0)” section above, we collect the above-listed categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) directly from individuals; through automated means (e.g. [Pixels, Tags and SDKs](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pixels-tags-and-sdks), [Cookies](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#cookie) or [Bid Requests](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#bid-request-bid-request-data)); and from third parties (e.g., our Clients).

Disclosures of personal information: As described in the “[Information sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.ckzev9puv755)” section above, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we have disclosed [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about California residents in all of the above-listed categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) to our affiliates and vendors. Additionally, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we have disclosed [Identifiers](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#pseudonymous-identifiers) to our partners.

Sale of personal information: Quantcast does not “sell” (as defined in the CCPA) [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) and has not “sold” [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) in the preceding twelve (12) months in relation to operating the Solutions.

Individual rights and requests: If you are a California resident, you have the right to request that we:

* Disclose to you the following information covering the 12 months preceding your request:
    
*   
    * the categories of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we have collected about you and the categories of sources from which we collected such information;
        
    * the specific pieces of [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we have collected about you;
        
    * the business or commercial purpose for collecting [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) about you;
        
    * the categories of third parties with whom we shared or to whom we disclosed such [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information); and
        
    * if we sold or disclosed your [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) for a business purpose, two separate lists disclosing:
        
    *   
        * sales, identifying the [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) categories that each category of recipient received; and
            
        * disclosures for a business purpose, identifying the [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) categories that each category of recipient obtained.
            
* Delete the [Personal Information](https://www.quantcast.com/privacy/key-terms/#personal-information) we have collected from you.
    

If you are interested in exercising one or more of the rights outlined above, please click the relevant link in the [“Your choices and legal rights”](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lEkN8dtde_3QIpsh1X0ZBLGYZlqZpCNS6hi-gk9owks/edit#heading=h.z337ya) section above. You may also submit requests by contacting us via email at privacy \[at\] quantcast \[dot\] com. We will attempt to verify your identity and respond to your request consistent with the CCPA.

**Who we are and what we do**
-----------------------------

Quantcast (“**we**”, “**our**”, or “**us**”) is a global digital advertising technology group of companies. Quantcast offers products and services that help digital advertisers and publishers (collectively, “**Clients**”) understand and grow their audiences (the “**Solutions**”). Through Quantcast Advertise Solutions, advertiser Clients can plan, activate, and measure the performance of their advertising campaigns seamlessly in a single audience platform, which helps them to place their ads to maximise results. Through Quantcast Measure Solutions, digital publisher Clients leverage insights to better understand the makeup of their audiences, how audiences spend their time across their digital properties, and what audiences care about, all of which help these digital businesses better connect their content and [Audiences](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) with the right advertising.

To provide the Solutions, Quantcast collects and uses [Personal Information](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) for various purposes, such as measuring and understanding audiences, targeting and delivering ads, measuring ad performance, and similar related purposes. As described in the “[Information Collection](https://app.pactsafe.com/contracts/337835/edit#_heading=h.tyjcwt)” section below, we may join or match Personal Information about you, which may include your [Online Data](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms) from your visits across different digital properties, like websites or mobile apps, that have implemented Quantcast Pixels, Tags or SDKs (which is sometimes called “tracking” in the industry) or Offline Data . This allows us, for example, to enrich our existing data sets and provide meaningful reports for our Clients regarding the effectiveness of their ads or content. We may also combine Personal Information that we collect in order to probabilistically link media consumption to a single user, which is sometimes called Cross-Media Matching/Linking. To the extent that we combine Personal Information that we collect from and about you in connection with our performance of the Solutions, we will use such combined information only as described in this Privacy Policy.

This Privacy Policy describes in more detail how we collect, use, disclose, and protect Personal Information, otherwise obtain and Process it in connection with the delivery of the Solutions, and the controls we provide you to manage such information and exercise your choices and legal rights. As noted in the “[Information use and legal basis](https://app.pactsafe.com/contracts/337835/edit#_heading=h.3dy6vkm)” section below, we use the Transparency and Consent Framework (“**TCF**”) standard to facilitate compliance with applicable laws in Europe, primarily in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (“**GDPR**”). Because the TCF is one means of explaining Processing activities, and because our Processing activities are consistent globally, the TCF Purposes are applicable to all Personal Information that we Process (regardless of the information’s country of origin).

In the United States, the Solutions are provided by Quantcast Corporation, located at 795 Folsom Street, San Francisco, CA 94107. Personal Information relating to individuals located within the United States provided to or gathered by us in connection with the delivery of the Solutions is controlled by Quantcast Corporation.

Outside of the United States, the Solutions are provided by Quantcast International Limited, located at Beaux Lane House, Lower Mercer Street, Dublin 2, Ireland. In so far as Quantcast acts as a “controller” (as defined under applicable law), Quantcast International Limited is the controller of your Personal Information if you reside in the European Economic Area (EEA), United Kingdom (UK), Switzerland, or any other jurisdiction outside of the United States.

**Self-regulatory standards**
-----------------------------

Quantcast supports and participates in several digital advertising self-regulatory organisations, as further described below.

* We are members in good standing of the Network Advertising Initiative (NAI) and adhere to the [NAI 2020 Code of Conduct](https://thenai.org/accountability/code-enforcement/).
* We participate in the Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA) and adhere to the [DAA Self-Regulatory Principles](https://youradchoices.com/principles).
* We participate in the European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance (EDAA) and are certified under the [EDAA Principles](http://www.edaa.eu/european-principles/).
* We participate in, and comply with, the policies and technical specifications of the [TCF](https://legal.quantcast.com/#key-terms), as a vendor. Quantcast’s IAB Europe-assigned identification numbers are CMP ID #10 (Quantcast Choice) and Vendor ID #11.

Please see the “[Your choices and legal rights](#your-choices)” section of this Privacy Policy for more information about the opt-out tools offered by the NAI, DAA, and EDAA.

_Do Not Track (“_**_DNT_**_”)_ is a preference that you can set in certain web browsers to inform the websites you visit that you do not want information about your online activity collected over time and across third-party websites or online services. We do not honor DNT or other similar signals at this time, due to the lack of a clear industry standard.
